萌.definition: (bound form) to sprout; to bud; (coll.) cute; adorable (orthographic borrowing from Japanese 萌え "moe", affection for an anime or manga character); (literary) common people (variant of 氓[meng2])

萌渚嶺.definition: Mengzhu mountain range between south Hunan and Guangxi

萌生.definition: to burgeon; to produce; to conceive; to be in the initial stage

萌發.definition: to sprout; to shoot; to bud

萌芽.definition: (of a seed) to germinate; (of a plant) to sprout; to bud; sprout; bud; (also used figuratively)
